appName: Ramp Car VR - GT Car Stunt
displayName: Ramp Car VR - GT Car Stunt
display_name: Ramp Car VR - GT Car Stunt
display_long_description:
Ramp Car VR - GT Car Stunt
A challenging VR car stunt simulator with exciting and puzzling levels.

Drive powerful GT cars across massive ramps, narrow tracks, and floating stunt platforms in full virtual reality. Ramp Car VR - GT Car Stunt is a skill-based VR driving game that blends stunt action with puzzle-style obstacle challenges.

Each level is designed to test your timing, precision, and control — with some focused on speed and others on clever navigation. It's a full VR experience made for players who enjoy both car stunt games and thoughtful level design.

Features:

Fully immersive VR stunt simulator gameplay

Challenging ramp and puzzle tracks

Smooth VR driving controls for a realistic feel

Designed for both quick play sessions and long challenge runs

Solo experience with no distractions — just you and the course

If you're looking for a ramp car game in VR that combines action with logic, this game is for you. Master the tracks, perfect your stunts, and enjoy a focused, skill-based driving experience built for Meta Quest.
